Load model data from specified source

load_model_data.hub.Rd

Load model data from specified source

Usage

load_model_data.hub(
  x,
  variable,
  years,
  xlim,
  ylim,
  aggr.m,
  database,
  temporal_chunking,
  temporal_chunk_size
)
